item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

We have not been to this Location in Years, so it's as if it's New Again!  Let's show them what the group can bring.

Monday 10/01/2012 week's location is:

Barcelona

Barcelona is a great tapas and wine bar in downtown New Haven.  Located on the corner of Temple and Crown streets, this classy joint has a wide selection of primarily Spanish Wine and Food.  The wine list, while not on special, is extensive.  The relaxed sexy bar atmosphere to the left as you enter features a "fire pit", which is the general vicinity we'll be in.

The Managers Tom and Hartin have generously offered us the following specials:

They plan to give each member One Complementary Glass of Sangria! (not sure of the process yet, just that's what they've promised.)

There will be a selection of their most popular Tapas provided for our Sampling. Make sure to get there early enough to get them while they last!

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people.

For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

ATTENTION: As some of you may know, Meetup does charge the Leadership twice a year for hosting the website. We do not pass this fee along in any mandatory way, however we will take donations at upcomming Happy Hours. Anything you can give towards defraying this cost to keeping the group going will be appreciated! Please see AJ, Devorah, or Jason at an October Happy hour Thanks!

I (A.J.) will serve as the contact for this evening. You can try my Cell at 315-345-9348, texting is fine as well.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text AJ at 315-345-9348. We're also probably amongst the largest groups at the Bar, on the "Fire Pit" side.
item.name: Happy Hour 10/1: Barcelona! (We have not been there in Years!)
